TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatusBar/StatusBarPanelCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 控件中的面板的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of panels in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储中显示的面板 。The class stores the panels displayed in the . 集合中的每个对象都是类的一个实例， 该类定义在中显示的面板的显示特征和行为 。Each object in the collection is an instance of the class which defines the display characteristics and behaviors of a panel displayed in a . 可以通过多种方法向集合中添加面板。There are a number of ways to add panels to the collection. 方法可向 集合添加单个面板。The method provides the ability to add a single panel to the collection. 若要向集合中添加多个面板，请创建一个对象数组， 并将其分配给 方法。To add a number of panels to the collection, you create an array of objects and assign it to the method. 如果要在集合中的特定位置插入面板，可以使用 方法。If you want to insert a panel at a specific location within the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除面板，可以使用 方法或 方法（如果你知道面板在集合中的位置）。To remove panels, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the panel is located within the collection. 使用方法，您可以从集合中删除所有面板，而不是使用 方法一次删除一个面板。The method enables you to remove all panels from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single panel at a time. 除了用于添加和删除面板的方法和属性外， 还提供用于在集合中查找面板的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing panels, the also provides methods to find panels within the collection. 使用 方法可以确定面板是否为集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether a panel is a member of the collection. 知道面板位于集合内后，可以使用 方法确定面板在集合中的位置。Once you know that the panel is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the panel is located within the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 在窗体上创建了一个控件并添加了两个 对象。The following code example creates a control on a form and adds two objects. 其中一个 名为的 `panel1` ，它显示应用程序的状态文本。One of the , named `panel1`, displays status text for an application. 第二个 名为的 `panel2` ，它显示当前日期，并使用 类的属性 来显示当前时间。The second , named `panel2`, displays the current date and uses the property of the class to display the current time. 该示例使用 属性来确保显示面板而不是标准面板，并使用和 属性访问 的方法 以将面板添加到中 。The example uses the property to ensure that the panels are displayed instead of a standard panel, and it uses and the property to access the method of the to add the panels to the . 该示例还使用 、 、 和 属性对对象进行初始化 。The example also uses the , , , and properties to initialize the objects. 此示例假定在示例中定义的方法是从的构造函数定义和调用的 。This example assumes that the method defined in the example is defined and called from the constructor of a . [!code-cpp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/StatusBar and StatusBarPanel Example/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将面板添加到 控件以显示多种类型的信息。You can add panels to a control to display more than one type of information. 此版本的 方法 使用参数中指定的文本创建一个新的 `text` ，并将其添加到集合中。This version of the method creates a new with the text specified in the `text` parameter and adds it to collection. 面板位于的顺序 表示面板在控件中的显示顺序 。The order in which panels are located in the represents the order that panels are displayed within the control. 从集合中的第一个面板开始，按从左到右的顺序显示面板。Panels are displayed from left to right starting with the first panel in the collection. 控件的属性 不会更改面板在中的显示顺序 。The property of the control does not change the order in which panels are displayed in the . 若要在集合中的特定位置插入面板，请使用 方法。To insert a panel at a specific position in the collection, use the method. 若要在一个操作中将一组面板添加到集合中，请使用 方法。To add a set of panels to the collection in a single operation, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从列表中删除面板时，集合中的后续项的索引会发生更改。When you remove a panel from the list, the indexes change for subsequent items in the collection. 删除的面板的所有信息都将被删除。All information about the removed panel is deleted. 通过指定 要从集合中删除的实际，可以使用此方法从中删除特定的面板。You can use this method to remove a specific panel from the by specifying the actual to remove from the collection. 若要指定要删除的面板的索引而不是面板本身，请使用 方法。To specify the index of the panel to remove instead of the panel itself, use the method. 若要从集合中删除所有面板，请使用 方法。To remove all panels from the collection, use the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从集合中移除面板时，集合中的后续面板的索引会发生更改。When you remove a panel from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent panels in the collection. 删除的面板的所有信息都将被删除。All information about the removed panel is deleted. 通过指定要从集合中移除的面板的索引，可以使用此方法从列表中删除特定的面板。You can use this method to remove a specific panel from the list by specifying the index of the panel to remove from the collection. 若要指定要删除的面板而不是面板的索引，请使用 方法。To specify the panel to remove instead of the index to the panel, use the method. 若要从控件中删除所有面板 ，请使用 方法。To remove all panels from the control, use the method.
